File /std/basic/extra_look.c

Handles adding bits to the long description of objects.

Written by Pinkfish

Method index

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
add_extra_look
void add_extra_look(object ob)
This method adds an object into the list of extra look objects. ob will need to have a string extra_look( object ) function defined on it which will actually give the extra look string. ob->extra_look() is called with the object to which you are adding the extra look.

Parameters:
ob - the object to add
See also:
calc_extra_look(), remove_extra_look() and query_extra_look_list()
calc_extra_look
string calc_extra_look()
This method creates the extra long stringsbased on the current list of objects to use an extra_look on. The function extra_look() is called on every object with this_object() passed in as the first (and only) parameter. If the result is non-zero it is added onto the output.

Returns:
the extra look string
See also:
add_extra_look(), remove_extra_look() and query_extra_look_list()
query_extra_look_list
object * query_extra_look_list()
This method returns the current list of objects to be used for the extra look list.

Returns:
the array of extra look objects
See also:
add_extra_look(), remove_extra_look() and calc_extra_look()
remove_extra_look
void remove_extra_look(object ob)
This method removes the object from the list of extra look objects.

Parameters:
ob - the object to remove
See also:
calc_extra_look(), add_extra_look() and query_extra_look_list()
